meanings.sent1: Humankind is capable of great kindness towards one another.
meanings.sent2: The history of humankind is filled with stories of triumph and struggle.
meanings.sent3: Humankind decided to have a dance-off to settle the argument.
meanings.sent4: In the vast universe, humankind is but a tiny speck of dust.
meanings.sent5: The survival of humankind depends on our ability to work together.

meanings.definition: Human beings collectively; the human species.
meanings.sent1: Humankind has explored the depths of the oceans and the heights of the mountains.
meanings.sent2: It is important for humankind to protect the environment for future generations.
meanings.sent3: Humankind tried to teach a dog how to drive a car.
meanings.sent4: The resilience of humankind in the face of adversity is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of humankind is what makes our world so fascinating.
